Sentencas: We study a counter-flow solid oxide fuel cell system and consider the challenges faced in minimizing thermal variations from the nominal operating conditions for a reasonable range of power tracking.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of counter flow SOFC with partial internal reformation

Sentencas: Blower dynamics, reformer transport delays, spatial distribution of the heat generated and the resulting thermal response are among the issues considered.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of counter flow SOFC with partial internal reformation

Sentencas: A novel approach, relying on partial internal reformation of the feedstock is proposed as a remedy to maintain a strong level of power tracking with minimal thermal stress to the fuel cell.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of counter flow SOFC with partial internal reformation
